General_Description: '''Chain of Possession''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On the corpse of a [[Sparta]]n soldier, Kassandra found a letter that detailed how valuables passed from villagers, to [[Thief|thieves]], to the Spartan. Kassandra set out to see that they next passed to her.
Section_Messages: *''Thieves have been pillaging the village. I took their loot while they slept, and hid it outside our camp. Sparta needs supplies.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra found the location and claimed the valuables for herself.
Section_Trivia: *{{Wiki|Chain of custody}}, in legal contexts, refers to the chronological documentation or paper trail that records the sequence of custody, control, transfer, analysis, and disposition of physical or electronic evidence.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
